title: FS: Lot of low grade T206 with HOFers, SL, etc...
author: scmavl

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of low grade T206 with HOFers, SL, etc...
posts.post_content:
I just can't afford to continue with this set right now so I'm letting all of it go. I'd like to sell these 28 cards as a lot. There are two different Mordecai Brown, Tinker, Lajoie, Collins, McGraw, Jennings, and a skinned McGinnity. There is a Southern Leaguer (Thebo) and lots of commons. The McIntyre in the case is very nice, with just some light wrinkles on the front that would likely get a 3.5 or 4. The Brown cards are both pretty nice. The only trimming that I know of is the bottom two corners of Lajoie cut diagonally but I have not measured the cards. You guys are the experts, not me. 

SOLD
